pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, October 26, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, October 26, 2017:

Toronto, Ontario  

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Machine Learning and the Market for Intelligence Conference at the Rotman School of Management. He will also participate in an armchair discussion.

Desautels Hall
Rotman School of Management
University of Toronto

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.

Burlington, Ontario 

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the YMCA Employment Services Burlington and deliver brief remarks followed by a media availability.

YMCA Burlington
500 Drury Lane

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.
